name: Calvin Wong Tze Loon 黃子倫 🇲🇾

content.html: 'he can fix twitter' man can't fix a fucking car window or make a door that opens. he's going to fix one of the largest and most complicated social networks after dissolving the board and firing all the staff? suuuure jan.
content.value:
'he can fix twitter' man can't fix a fucking car window or make a door that opens.

he's going to fix one of the largest and most complicated social networks after dissolving the board and firing all the staff?

suuuure jan.
